overview:
As CEO of ViziApps, Inc., George Adams has over 30 years of experience as a proven leader in the IT industry, with expertise in the mobile, networking, security and cloud markets.

Adams has launched and built new businesses, turned around early-stage startups and delivered profitability to public companies.

As the CEO and Co-Founder of ViziApps, Inc., a SaaS-based platform enabling non-technical users to visually create robust, native mobile apps for iPhones and Android phones, without coding.

Prior to founding ViziApps, Adams served as CEO of SSH Communications Security Inc./Tectia, a global developer of communications security solutions. Under his leadership, the company had a successful $400M IPO. He currently serves on the SSH Board.

He’s help senior-level positions at companies including Phoenix Technologies, Sun Microsystems, Intel, Analog Devices, and Motorola. Adams earned an MBA from Boston University and a BSEE from the University of Miami.

Adams has also spoken at numerous industry events including Xconomy Mobile Madness, WebInno, SMEI, Cloud Computing Meetup, IDC Security Forum, RSA Security Conference, InfoSec and COMdex.
